title: Ice Dreams
description: Madison Sinclair is the sister of the well known Canadian hockey player, Carter Sinclair. She was forced to grow up in his shadow because he was born and raised to be a hockey player and their parents wouldn't allow anyone to stand in his way, including Madison. Because of the family drama, she missed out on all the important stuff that a young teenage girl should experience in her life which included dances, boys, sleepovers and even her first kiss. Once Carter was in the midst of his career, he realized the mistakes from his childhood and worked on improving his relationship with Madison. She couldn't have been happier when he asked her to visit him and his fianc√©e, Alicia in the States. Once she arrived, she was introduced to Hunter Longo, Carter's best friend and teammate. There was chemistry between them the moment they saw each other but would she be able to get through her insecurities in order to get closer to him?Everyone warned her to take things slow but would she be able to when her heart was calling the shots?
author: Melissa Johns
